channel.title: Leet Speak
channel.description: Leet Speak is a group of friends who play video games as if it were their religion. Leet Speak is a podcast made by them covering hot topics of games, movies and tv, politics, and funny every day happenings in their lives. Shows are aired every monday and friday, We are completely interactive so if you want your voice heard leave us a comment or email us! We also have monthly contests, guest speakers and much more!
channel.itunes:subtitle: Gamers, out loud.
channel.itunes:author: Leet Speak
channel.itunes:summary: Leet Speak is a group of friends who play video games as if it were their religion. Leet Speak is a podcast made by them covering hot topics of games, movies and tv, politics, and funny every day happenings in their lives. Shows are aired every monday and friday, We are completely interactive so if you want your voice heard leave us a comment or email us! We also have monthly contests, guest speakers and much more!

item.title: Episode 43 - Paint me like one of your french girls, Brandon
item.description: Kyle, Brandon, Dylan, and Maggie discuss SKYRIM OMGEE IT'S TEH BESTORZ! They also circle jerk over the MGS HD collection. Dylan talks about boobs, Brandon talks about character customization. Yep, this episode has it all.
item.dc:creator: Leet Speak
item.itunes:summary: Kyle, Brandon, Dylan, and Maggie discuss SKYRIM OMGEE IT'S TEH BESTORZ! They also circle jerk over the MGS HD collection. Dylan talks about boobs, Brandon talks about character customization. Yep, this episode has it all.

item.title: Episode 42 - Gears of Brandon
item.description: Brandon, Kyle, and Dylan discuss Gears of War 3 as the main highlight of the podcast. Other subjects also discussed were DC Universe Online, Payday: The Heist, Batman: Arkham City, and Grand Theft Auto V. Want to be a guest host on Leet Speak with the potential to become a regular? Here's your chance! 1. Go to your Facebook. You need to have friends. We don't like people without friends. 2. Go to www.facebook.com/tsugproductions OR https://www.facebook.com/tsugproductions 3. Send a message (or post right on the wall) saying something like "LET ME BE ON THE SHOW!" 4. One of the page administrators will get in touch with you. NOTE: You'll need Skype and you'll need to be pretty free late Friday night or late Saturday night.
item.dc:creator: Leet Speak
item.itunes:summary:
Brandon, Kyle, and Dylan discuss Gears of War 3 as the main highlight of the podcast. Other subjects also discussed were DC Universe Online, Payday: The Heist, Batman: Arkham City, and Grand Theft Auto V.
Want to be a guest host on Leet Speak with the potential to become a regular? Here's your chance!
1. Go to your Facebook. You need to have friends. We don't like people without friends. 2. Go to www.facebook.com/tsugproductions OR https://www.facebook.com/tsugproductions 3. Send a message (or post right on the wall) saying something like "LET ME BE ON THE SHOW!" 4. One of the page administrators will get in touch with you. NOTE: You'll need Skype and you'll need to be pretty free late Friday night or late Saturday night.

item.title: Episode SPACE PIRATES AND ZOMBIES!
item.description: Kyle, Scott, and Dylan interview Andrew Hume and Richard Cliff from MinMax Games about their game, Space Pirates And Zombies. They discuss topics ranging from the start of MinMax games to what's next. Make sure you don't miss out on an interview with this very awesome two-man gaming group. :D SPAZ Website - http://spacepiratesandzombies.com/ MinMax Games Website - http://minmax-games.com/ SPAZ on Steam - http://store.steampowered.com/app/107200/
item.dc:creator: Leet Speak
item.itunes:summary:
Kyle, Scott, and Dylan interview Andrew Hume and Richard Cliff from MinMax Games about their game, Space Pirates And Zombies. They discuss topics ranging from the start of MinMax games to what's next. Make sure you don't miss out on an interview with this very awesome two-man gaming group. :D
SPAZ Website - http://spacepiratesandzombies.com/ MinMax Games Website - http://minmax-games.com/ SPAZ on Steam - http://store.steampowered.com/app/107200/

item.title: Episode 41 - Girl on Dog Mechanics
item.description: Ohhhh yeeeeaaa. Scott, Dylan, and Kyle discuss E3, Metal Gear Solid, Rule Of Rose, and ..GRAY FOX. Brandon is still dead, or sick, or something like that. WHO CAREZ LUL. Dylan discusses the Wii-U and how dirty he feels for saying it's name, as well as the Star Wars Kinect fail. Also Scott drinks milk out of a bag.

item.title: Super Special Final Fantasy Podcaaaaaaaaaaaast!
item.description: WE TALK ABOUT FINAL FANTASY. YOU LISTEN AND COMMENT. FUCK YEAH.
